testcase.classname: As a user I want to be able to filter products
testcase.name: Filter items by Name (A to Z)
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed Given "PRODUCTS" page is open...............................................passed When I filter items by "Name (A to Z)"......................................passed Then I verify that items are ordered by "Name (A to Z)".....................passed

testcase.classname: As a user I want to be able to filter products
testcase.name: Filter items by Name (Z to A)
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed Given "PRODUCTS" page is open...............................................passed When I filter items by "Name (Z to A)"......................................passed Then I verify that items are ordered by "Name (Z to A)".....................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed Given "PRODUCTS" page is open...............................................passed When I filter items by "Price (high to low)"................................passed Then I verify that items are ordered by "Price (high to low)"...............passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to login into app
testcase.name: Login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Login page is open....................................................passed When I type "standard_user" as username.....................................passed And I type "secret_sauce" as password.......................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then URL should contain "inventory".........................................passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to login into app
testcase.name: Login with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Login page is open....................................................passed When I type "invalid_username" as username..................................passed And I type "invalid_password" as password...................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should see error message "Epic sadface: Username and password do not match any user in this service".passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to login into app
testcase.name: Login with empty username
testcase.system-out: Given Login page is open....................................................passed When I type "invalid_password" as password..................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should see error message "Epic sadface: Username is required"........passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to login into app
testcase.name: Login with empty password
testcase.system-out: Given Login page is open....................................................passed When I type "invalid_username" as username..................................passed And I click on Login button.................................................passed Then I should see error message "Epic sadface: Password is required"........passed

testcase.classname: As a user, I want to be able to login into app
testcase.name: Logout from account
testcase.system-out: Given User is logged in.....................................................passed When I click on "Logout" button from sidebar menu...........................passed Then I should be redirected to login page...................................passed
